feed.title: Activepieces Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Activepieces: 0.46.1
entry.content:
üêû Bug Fixes

  • fix: we should always use importFresh in code executor (#6986) @hazemadelkhalel
  • fix: missing Write project permission for alert settings & missing alerts in project role dialog (#6985) @hazemadelkhalel
  • feat(auto-trial-activation): automatically activate a trial key when the platform is deployed on the cloud (#6984) @amrabuaza
  • fix: missing encoding in Content-Disposition header when downloading step files (#6982) @janwytze

Thanks ‚ù§Ô∏è

@AbdulTheActivePiecer, @abuaboud, @amrabuaza, @hazemadelkhalel and @janwytze

entry.title: New release for Activepieces: 0.46.2
entry.content:
üß© Pieces

  • feat: add respond to webhook return response action (#6992) @hazemadelkhalel
  • revert: remove respond from webhook piece [breaking change] (#6991) @hazemadelkhalel
  • feat(linear): set team_id optional on linear issue update trigger (#6980) @ArnaudSpanneut

üêû Bug Fixes

  • fix: saving SSO providers + show trial license key expiration date (#6994) @AbdulTheActivePiecer
  • fix: list owners should be only for ee (#7000) @abuaboud
  • fix: get used piecess (#6999) @abuaboud
  • fix: UI error when using AI generated code before ever testing the step. (#6993) @AbdulTheActivePiecer

üé® Enhancements & Polish

  • feat: optimize fetching /options for pieces by using cache (#7001) @hazemadelkhalel
  • feat: move flows & folders actions requires write folder permission (#6990) @hazemadelkhalel

Thanks ‚ù§Ô∏è

@AbdulTheActivePiecer, @ArnaudSpanneut, @abuaboud, @hazemadelkhalel and @s31w4n

entry.title: New release for Activepieces: 0.46.5
entry.content:
‚ú® Exciting New Features

üêû Bug Fixes

üßπ Maintenance & Dev Experience
